description:
Combining style and functionality, the Mustang Sherpa Work Vest is a new piece that will become a staple of our workwear collection.

The 12 oz canvas fabric is made from a blend of 65 % recycled polyester and 35 % cotton allowing it to withstand the toughest tasks. The inside lining, crafted from 100 % recycled polyester sherpa fleece, provides exceptional warmth and comfort.

With four flapped pockets, two hand warmer pockets, and an interior pocket, this vest offers ample storage space for tools, personal belongings, and everyday essentials. The YKK® metal zipper ensures smooth functionality and durability.

Whether it's a workday, a casual outing in the city, or an outdoor adventure.
name: Hooke Mustang Sherpa Work Vest - Mens
